title: F. In Every Generation...
statement: In every generation there is a Chosen One. She alone will stand against the vampires, the demons, and the forces of darkness. She is the Slayer. — Joss Whedon
inputSpecification: A string $$$s$$$ ($$$3 \le |s| \le 7$$$) consisting of lowercase English letters.
outputSpecification: A single string. If there is no answer, print "none" (without the quotes).
name: In Every Generation...
